About (CV)


I am a PhD candidate at LIVIA lab in ETS.

Currently working on mechanizing fairness constraints in clustering methods in a fast and effective manner; improving metric loss for person re-ID and domain adaptation in semantic segmentation.

Research interests: Unsupervised learning, Domain adaptation, Deep Metric learning, Optimization methods in learning.

Application areas: Cluster analysis, Semantic segmentation, Person re-id, Medical image analysis.


News

  • 2018-09-05: NIPS paper got accepted as a spotlight!
  • 2017-09-05: Defended PhD thesis proposal successfully.
  • 2016-05-01: Started PhD studies supervised by Prof. Ismail Ben Ayed & Prof. Eric Granger.

Publications

(*Spotlight*) [[PDF](https://arxiv.org/abs/1810.13044)] [[Code](https://github.com/imtiazziko/SLK)] - **Supervised spectral subspace clustering for visual dictionary creation in the context of image classification** Imtiaz Masud Ziko, Elisa Fromont, Damien Muselet and Marc Sebban In *IAPR Asian Conference on Pattern Recognition (ACPR)*, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, 3-6 Nov. 2015. [[PDF](https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/7486525/)] - **Design and Creation of a Multi-Illuminant Scene Image Dataset** Imtiaz Masud Ziko, Shida Beigpour and Jon Y. Herdeberg In *International Conference on Image and Signal Processing (ICISP)*, Springer, 531-538, July 2014. [[PDF](https://link.springer.com/chapter/10.1007/978-3-319-07998-1_61)] [[Dataset](http://www.ansatt.hig.no/mariusp/CID_MI_Dataset_ICISP_2014.zip)]
